flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to serve 5 shrimp per guest and will have 40 guests so he needs 5*40 = <<5*40=200>>200 shrimp
Each pound of shrimp has 20 shrimp and he needs 200 shrimp so he needs 200/20 = <<200/20=10.0>>10.0 pounds of shrimp
The shrimp is $17.0 per pound and he needs 10.0 pounds so he will spend 17.0*10.0 = $<<17.0*10.0=710.0>>710.0 on shrimp

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 170.0, not 710.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
